attributes.action: change the criteria for women to be sterilised.
attributes.additional_details: The medical council now recommends that you must have been on either the coil or the implant for a year, and have to have had problems with these types of contraception before they will even consider sterilisation no other contraception counts towards this.
attributes.background: i have 6 children but Im not allowed to be sterilised, the medical council have changed the criteria. I dont want more children and most contraception I can't use. I don't want to take drugs or hormones for life I just want for me and other women who know their minds to be allowed to be sterilised.
